content: this legal text summarizes a civil case in harju county court regarding a dispute over the division of inheritance and joint property between spouses the plaintiff vg is demanding 7000 euros from the defendant ap the case has been ongoing for 2 years and 1 month and the final resolution was announced in november 2020 the court conducted expert examinations and resolved requests for expert examinations the court dismissed the lawsuit but the plaintiffs submitted a procedural document to eliminate deficiencies the court accepted a claim between the plaintiff and defendant regarding a payment of money the court made a public announcement of its judgment the court considered a printout from the land registry as evidence of joint ownership of an apartment the estate includes bank accounts an apartment property and a vehicle the court divided the inheritance and joint assets awarding the apartment to vg and the car to pg the court ordered changes to be made in the land register and awarded compensation to the plaintiffs the court determined the amount of compensation the defendant should pay for the loss of property the court also resolved disputes over joint bank accounts distributing the money among the parties the court determined that the parties should bear the costs of the proceedings equally

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
